item.title: Nexus Dashboard 3.1
item.description:
The ultimate dashboard template
Made with Tailwind CSS 4 and daisyUI 5
Including: - All pages - 3 dashboard layouts (CRM, e-commerce, Gen-AI) - Landing page - 10 e-commerce pages with tables, forms, cards, etc - File manager app layout - Chat app layout - 4 pages for the gen-AI app (home, images, content creator, library) - Agentic Storage UI ðŸ†• - 4 auth pages including login, register, password reset - Profile settings page and support/FAQ page - Foundation component example ðŸ†• - 15+ Ready to use UI blocks ðŸ†• - 50+ Common layout examples ðŸ†• - 100+ Interaction examples with different plugin integrations ðŸ†• - LLM files ðŸ†• - Apex charts - 6 exclusive customizable themes - Compatible with all daisyUI themes
Solo license: - Includes HTML version - For one developer, one project
Team and Enterprise license: - includes HTML, React, Next.js, Nuxt, SvelteKit and ðŸ†• Laravel versions - For unlimited developers - For unlimited projects (Enterprise only)

item.title: Scalo Startup Template 2.0
item.description:
Scalo is the ultimate startup front-end template
Made with Tailwind CSS 4 and daisyUI 5
Including: - 36 Pages - 2 Landings (Automation and developer) - 7 Pricing sections (Lifetime, Subscription, User-based & comparison-based) - 6 Auth pages (Login, Register, 2FA, Forgot password, Reset password, Verify) - Settings (Profile, Account, Notification & Manage plans) - Company pages (Team, Careers, Blogs, Timeline, Privacy & more) - Extra pages (Coming soon page, Maintenance page, Notify & Error pages) - Testimonial Sections (Simple + Swiper) - FAQs + Contact Us pages - Included with light & dark themes - Compatible with all daisyUI themes
Solo license: - Includes HTML version - For one developer, one project
Team and Enterprise license: - includes HTML, React, Next.js, SvelteKit and ðŸ†• Nuxt versions - For unlimited developers - For unlimited projects (Enterprise only)

item.title: Official daisyUI Figma Library 2.0
item.description:
ðŸŽ‰ New version is available!
**Available in 3 plans**, Including: - Documentation and step by step tutorial for everything - All daisyUI components (61+) - All daisyUI variants (2500+) - All properties - Variables for all colors of all 35 daisyUI themes - Variables for everything (colors, border-radius, typography, spacing, etc) - 16 simultaneous themes (Quickly switch between daisyUI themes) - Examples for Dashboard and forms - Access to exclusive Discord channel for priority support

item.title: HTML Dashboard template
item.description:
Production-ready admin dashboard template to use in your project right now.
Features: - HTML admin dashboard layout made with daisyUI 5 - Web component charts - Framework agnostic. Can be used everywhere - No dependencies
Including: - 2 exclusive daisyUI themes (dark/light) + Compatible with all 32 daisyUI themes - Responsive grid layout - 14 blocks of useful sections for dashboard - Sidebar with collapsible submenus - Tables and Item lists - Dropdown menus - Charts and forms

item.title: Blink template
item.description:
Blink is a template for agencies, companies, startups, or small businesses
Available for React and Svelte Features: - Made with Tailwind CSS and daisyUI - Compatible with all daisyUI themes - Clean, responsive, easy to customize - Dark and light theme switch button Including: - Landing page - Pricing page and pricing table - Projects (portfolio) page - About page - Contact form

item.title: Online Store template 2.0
item.description:
**Fully functional store template for Lemon Squeezy or Gumroad**
Made with daisyUI 5 and Next.js 15
Add your **LemonSqueezy API key** or **Gumroad API key** to the env file, add custom data for your products and your online store will be ready in **less than 5 minutes**!
This template receives your simple list of products coming from the LemonSqueezy API or Gumroad API, adds your custom data and attributes to the products and generates a functional online store with all the standard online store capabilities you need.
Including Homepage, collections page with filter and sort, product page with image gallery, zoom, custom attributes, variant links, related product suggestions and more.

item.title: SaaS landing page
item.description:
Production-ready landing page for software products.
Features: - SaaS landing page layout made with daisyUI 5 - Available for HTML, React, Svelte, Vue
Including: - 2 exclusive daisyUI themes (dark/light) - Compatible with all daisyUI themes (32 themes) - Responsive layout - Hero section, Partner logos, Features section, Integrations cards, Pricing tables, FAQ accordion section, Footer with links and contact form - Pricing table with dynamic price toggle - Theme changer menu - 3D card effect

item.title: Blog template 2.0
item.description:
Fully working multi page blog template made with daisyUI
Available for Astro and Next.js
Features: - Made with Markdown, Tailwind CSS and daisyUI - Layout options for personal blog and company blog - SEO friendly, Lightweight and fast - Dark mode and Light mode
Including: - Homepage (with two layout options) - About page - Article page - Articles archive with pagination (with two layout options)

item.title: Documentation template
item.description:
Create a modern and clean document site for your open source projects
Features: - Available for Astro and Next.js - Made with Markdown, Tailwind CSS and daisyUI - Search functionality - SEO friendly, Lightweight and fast - Dark mode and Light mode
Including: - Homepage with features sections, code demo, contributors images, testimonials and installation guide - Document pages made from Markdown files with Sidebar, page content links, sponsors section - Search bar using Algolia DocSearch - Theme switch button with dark theme and light theme (compatible with all daisyUI themes)

item.title: Mobile app landing page
item.description:
Landing page for mobile app introduction.
Features: - A landing page layout made with daisyUI 5 - Available for HTML, React, Svelte, Vue
Including: - 2 exclusive daisyUI themes (dark/light) - Compatible with all daisyUI themes (32 themes) - Responsive layout - Navbar, Hero section with gradient background, mobile mockups, stats, features section, testimonial slider, FAQ, footer with email form and social media icons - Theme changer menu

item.title: Auth template
item.description:
Professionally designed auth pages to use in your project right away.
Features: - 3 HTML pages made with daisyUI 5 - Framework agnostic. Can be used everywhere - Compatible with all 32 daisyUI themes
Including: - Login page - Signup page - Password recovery page - Form inputs with HTML validation and validation styles - Login with Google button - Toggle and Alert examples
